description: Welcome to VERSANT. A boutique collection of Modern Craftsman-inspired townhomes built by award-winning Infinity Properties. This 3-bed 2.5 bath home features a functional layout for growing families. Large kitchen with custom cabinetry, quartz countertops, SS app w/GAS range and entertaining island with eating bar. Deck off kitchen w/Gas BBQ outlet leads to a RAISED fully fenced BACKYARD. Laminate flooring on main floor, high efficiency gas furnace with AC and Rinnai water heater. Upper floor feat. 3 bedrooms incl. SPACIOUS primary bedroom w/spa inspired ensuite. Enjoy easy access to hiking trails, mountain biking routes + lakes. Only 10 minutes from the Skytrain, West Coast Express + Coquitlam City Centre Shopping + Amenities. Open Sat-Wed 12-5 PM.
